java/liquibase/change/AddUniqueConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase.AlterTableVisitor;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.AddUniqueConstraintStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00010 import liquibase.database.structure.Index;
00011 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00012 import liquibase.exception.JDBCException;
00013 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00014 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00015 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00016 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00017 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00018 
00019 import java.util.ArrayList;
00020 import java.util.HashSet;
00021 import java.util.List;
00022 import java.util.Set;
00023 
00027 public class AddUniqueConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00028 
00029     private String schemaName;
00030     private String tableName;
00031     private String columnNames;
00032     private String constraintName;
00033     private String tablespace;
00034 
00035     public AddUniqueConstraintChange() {
00036         super("addUniqueConstraint", "Add Unique Constraint");
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getSchemaName() {
00040         return schemaName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00044         this.schemaName = StringUtils.trimToNull(schemaName);
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getTableName() {
00048         return tableName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00052         this.tableName = tableName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getColumnNames() {
00056         return columnNames;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setColumnNames(String columnNames) {
00060         this.columnNames = columnNames;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public String getConstraintName() {
00064         return constraintName;
00065     }
00066 
00067     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00068         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00069     }
00070 
00071 
00072     public String getTablespace() {
00073         return tablespace;
00074     }
00075 
00076     public void setTablespace(String tablespace) {
00077         this.tablespace = tablespace;
00078     }
00079 
00080     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00081         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(tableName) == null) {
00082             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("tableName is required", this);
00083         }
00084         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(columnNames) == null) {
00085             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("columnNames is required", this);
00086         }
00087 
00088     }
00089 
00090     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00091         
00092         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00093                 // return special statements for SQLite databases
00094                 return generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(database);
00095         }
00096         
00097         AddUniqueConstraintStatement statement = new AddUniqueConstraintStatement(getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName(), getTableName(), getColumnNames(), getConstraintName());
00098         statement.setTablespace(getTablespace());
00099 
00100         return new SqlStatement[] { statement };
00101     }
00102     
00103     private SqlStatement[] generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(Database database) 
00104                         throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00105         
00106         // SQLite does not support this ALTER TABLE operation until now.
00107                 // For more information see: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html.
00108                 // This is a small work around...
00109         
00110         List<SqlStatement> statements = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00111         
00112                 // define alter table logic
00113                 AlterTableVisitor rename_alter_visitor = new AlterTableVisitor() {
00114                         public ColumnConfig[] getColumnsToAdd() {
00115                                 return new ColumnConfig[0];
00116                         }
00117                         public boolean copyThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00118                                 return true;
00119                         }
00120                         public boolean createThisColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00121                                 String[] split_columns = getColumnNames().split("[ ]*,[ ]*");
00122                                 for (String split_column:split_columns) {
00123                                         if (column.getName().equals(split_column)) {
00124                                         column.getConstraints().setUnique(true);                                                
00125                                 }
00126                                 }
00127                                 return true;
00128                         }
00129                         public boolean createThisIndex(Index index) {
00130                                 return true;
00131                         }
00132                 };
00133                 
00134         try {
00135                 // alter table
00136                         statements.addAll(SQLiteDatabase.getAlterTableStatements(
00137                                         rename_alter_visitor,
00138                                         database,getSchemaName(),getTableName()));
00139         } catch (JDBCException e) {
00140                         e.printStackTrace();
00141                 }
00142         
00143         return statements.toArray(new SqlStatement[statements.size()]);
00144     }
00145 
00146     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00147         return "Unique constraint added to "+getTableName()+"("+getColumnNames()+")";
00148     }
00149 
00150     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00151         DropUniqueConstraintChange inverse = new DropUniqueConstraintChange();
00152         inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00153         inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00154         inverse.setConstraintName(getConstraintName());
00155 
00156         return new Change[]{
00157                 inverse,
00158         };
00159     }
00160 
00161     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00162         Element element = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00163         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00164             element.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00165         }
00166         if (getTablespace() != null) {
00167             element.setAttribute("tablespace", getTablespace());            
00168         }
00169 
00170         element.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00171         element.setAttribute("columnNames", getColumnNames());
00172         element.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00173 
00174         return element;
00175     }
00176 
00177     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00178 
00179         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00180 
00181         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00182         returnSet.add(table);
00183 
00184         for (String columnName : getColumnNames().split(",")) {
00185             Column column = new Column();
00186             column.setTable(table);
00187             column.setName(columnName.trim());
00188 
00189             returnSet.add(column);
00190         }
00191 
00192         return returnSet;
00193 
00194     }
00195 
00196 }
